system.availability:
A Trap to Ensnare Daemons. Grants +10 to any Ritual used to Summon and Bind a Daemon, each use requires Fresh Blood as Bait.
Constructed from Sacrificial Sinew and hair, soaked in user's blood, the bone dust of a slain foe, and prepared within briny water.
system.cost: Rare Availbility on War Moons of Talax. Somewhat Heretical.
